description:
syscall: manually fix z* for NetBSD/amd64

Building go currently fails on NetBSD, thus the regeneration
scripts do not run correctly. With these changes, at least
the go_bootstrap tool builds correctly.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

This is fine for now, since NetBSD support is still young, but make sure
the generation scripts produce this same output later.

On Fri, Apr 6, 2012 at 4:10 AM, <bsiegert@gmail.com> wrote:

> ping?
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5695064/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5695064/>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f31110b1aec7 ***

syscall: manually fix z* for NetBSD/amd64

Building go currently fails on NetBSD, thus the regeneration
scripts do not run correctly. With these changes, at least
the go_bootstrap tool builds correctly.

R=golang-dev, r, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5695064

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>

subject: code review 5695064: syscall: manually fix z* for NetBSD/amd64
